refnamediv.refpurpose: Definitions and Functions relating to RGB colors.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Definitions and Functions relating to RGB colors.

refsect2.title: GimpRGB
enum GimpRGBCompositeMode
gimp_rgb_set ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gimp_rgb_set (GimpRGB *rgb, gdouble red, gdouble green, gdouble blue);
refsect2.para: Sets the red, green and blue components of rgb and leaves the alpha component unchanged. The color values should be between 0.0 and 1.0 but there is no check to enforce this and the values are set exactly as they are passed in.

listitem.simpara: a GimpRGB struct

refsect2.title: gimp_rgb_set_alpha ()
refsect2.para: Sets the alpha component of rgb and leaves the RGB components unchanged.

listitem.simpara: a GimpRGB struct

refsect2.title: gimp_rgb_set_uchar ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gimp_rgb_set_uchar (GimpRGB *rgb, guchar red, guchar green, guchar blue);
refsect2.para: Sets the red, green and blue components of rgb from 8bit values (0 to 255) and leaves the alpha component unchanged.

listitem.simpara: a GimpRGB struct

refsect2.title: gimp_rgb_get_uchar ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gimp_rgb_get_uchar (const GimpRGB *rgb, guchar *red, guchar *green, guchar *blue);

refsect2.title: gimp_rgb_parse_name ()
refsect2.para: Attempts to parse a color name. This function accepts SVG 1.0 color keywords.
This function does not touch the alpha component of rgb.

listitem.simpara: a GimpRGB struct used to return the parsed color
a color name (in UTF-8 encoding)
the length of name, in bytes. or -1 if name is nul-terminated
TRUE if name was parsed successfully and rgb has been set, FALSE otherwise

refsect2.para: Since GIMP 2.2

refsect2.title: gimp_rgb_parse_hex ()
refsect2.para: Attempts to parse a string describing an RGB color in hexadecimal notation (optionally prefixed with a '#').
This function does not touch the alpha component of rgb.

listitem.simpara: a GimpRGB struct used to return the parsed color
a string describing a color in hexadecimal notation
the length of hex, in bytes. or -1 if hex is nul-terminated
TRUE if hex was parsed successfully and rgb has been set, FALSE otherwise

refsect2.para: Since GIMP 2.2

refsect2.title: gimp_rgb_parse_css ()
refsect2.para: Attempts to parse a string describing an RGB color in CSS notation. This can be either a numerical representation (rgb(255,0,0) or rgb(100%,0%,0%)) or a hexadecimal notation as parsed by gimp_rgb_parse_hex() (#ff0000) or a color name as parsed by gimp_rgb_parse_name() (red).
This function does not touch the alpha component of rgb.

listitem.simpara: a GimpRGB struct used to return the parsed color
a string describing a color in CSS notation
the length of hex, in bytes. or -1 if hex is nul-terminated
TRUE if css was parsed successfully and rgb has been set, FALSE otherwise

refsect2.para: Since GIMP 2.2

refsect2.title: gimp_rgb_list_names ()
refsect2.para: Allows to retrieve the list of SVG 1.0 color keywords that is used by gimp_rgb_parse_name().
The returned strings are const and must not be freed. Only the two arrays are allocated dynamically. You must call g_free() on the names and colors arrays when they are not any longer needed.

listitem.simpara: return location for an array of color names
return location for an array of GimpRGB structs
the number of named colors (i.e. the length of the returned arrays)

refsect2.para: Since GIMP 2.2

refsect2.title: gimp_rgb_luminance ()

listitem.simpara: the luminous intensity of the range from 0.0 to 1.0.

refsect2.para: Since GIMP 2.4

refsect2.title: gimp_rgb_luminance_uchar ()

listitem.simpara: the luminous intensity in the range from 0 to 255.

refsect2.para: Since GIMP 2.4

refsect2.title: gimp_rgb_intensity ()

warning.para: gimp_rgb_intensity is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: This function is deprecated! Use gimp_rgb_luminance() instead.

listitem.simpara: the intensity in the range from 0.0 to 1.0.

refsect2.title: gimp_rgb_intensity_uchar ()

warning.para: gimp_rgb_intensity_uchar is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: This function is deprecated! Use gimp_rgb_luminance_uchar() instead.

listitem.simpara: the intensity in the range from 0 to 255.

refsect2.title: gimp_rgb_composite ()
gimp_rgba_set ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gimp_rgba_set (GimpRGB *rgba, gdouble red, gdouble green, gdouble blue, gdouble alpha);
refsect2.para: Sets the red, green, blue and alpha components of rgb. The values should be between 0.0 and 1.0 but there is no check to enforce this and the values are set exactly as they are passed in.

listitem.simpara: a GimpRGB struct

refsect2.title: gimp_rgba_set_uchar ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gimp_rgba_set_uchar (GimpRGB *rgba, guchar red, guchar green, guchar blue, guchar alpha);
refsect2.para: Sets the red, green, blue and alpha components of rgb from 8bit values (0 to 255).

listitem.simpara: a GimpRGB struct

refsect2.title: gimp_rgba_get_uchar ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gimp_rgba_get_uchar (const GimpRGB *rgba, guchar *red, guchar *green, guchar *blue, guchar *alpha);

refsect2.title: gimp_rgba_parse_css ()
refsect2.para: Similar to gimp_rgb_parse_css() but handles RGB colors with alpha channel in the numerical CSS notation (rgba(255,0,0,255) or rgba(100%,0%,0%,1000%)).
It doesn't handle the hexadecimal notation or color names because they leave the alpha channel unspecified.

listitem.simpara: a GimpRGB struct used to return the parsed color
a string describing a color in CSS notation
the length of hex, in bytes. or -1 if hex is nul-terminated
TRUE if css was parsed successfully and rgb has been set, FALSE otherwise

refsect2.para: Since GIMP 2.2

refsect2.title: GIMP_RGB_INTENSITY()

warning.para: GIMP_RGB_INTENSITY is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: This macro calculates the intensity of an RGB value based on coefficients taken from the NTSC analog television standard.

listitem.simpara: red
green
blue

warning.para: GIMP_RGB_INTENSITY_RED is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.
GIMP_RGB_INTENSITY_GREEN is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.
GIMP_RGB_INTENSITY_BLUE is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.title: GIMP_TYPE_RGB
refsect2.para: GIMP_TYPE_RGB is a GType derived from G_TYPE_BOXED.

refsect2.title: gimp_param_spec_rgb ()
refsect2.programlisting: GParamSpec* gimp_param_spec_rgb (const gchar *name, const gchar *nick, const gchar *blurb, gboolean has_alpha, const GimpRGB *default_value, GParamFlags flags);
refsect2.para: Creates a param spec to hold an GimpRGB value. See g_param_spec_internal() for more information.

listitem.simpara: Canonical name of the param
Nickname of the param
Brief desciption of param.
TRUE if the alpha channel has relevance.
Value to use if none is assigned.
a combination of GParamFlags
a newly allocated GParamSpec instance

refsect2.para: Since GIMP 2.4

refsect2.title: gimp_param_spec_rgb_has_alpha ()

listitem.simpara: a GParamSpec to hold an GimpRGB value.
TRUE if the alpha channel is relevant.

refsect2.para: Since GIMP 2.4
